Beyond The Veil.card_desc: [Stasis Field] You and allies gain {scale=10|10}% increased Movement Speed for 5s after passing through Stasis Field.

Continuum Shift.card_desc: [Second Chance] Second Chance sends you {scale=0.4|0.4}s further into the past.

Deja vu.card_desc: [Setback] Setback becomes a lobbed explosive, capable of rewinding multiple enemies.

Distant Memory.card_desc: [Armor] While below 50% Health receive {scale=5|5}% increased healing from other players.

Hell Hunter.card_desc: [Weapon] Hitting fully charged weapon shots restores {scale=1|1} ammo.

Infinity Engine.card_desc: [Stasis Field] Activating Stasis Field causes you to no longer consume ammo for {scale=1|1}s.

Lessons of the Past.card_desc: [Setback] Hitting an enemy with Setback grants yourself a {scale=75|75} Health Shield for 3s.

Life Unlived.card_desc: [Second Chance] Second Chance heals you an additional {scale=150|150} Health.

Lost Legacy.card_desc: [Stasis Field] Activating Stasis Field heals you {scale=80|80} Health per second for 3s.

No One Escapes.card_desc: [Setback] Setback sends enemies {scale=0.3|0.3}s further into the past.

Old Wounds.card_desc: [Armor] Increase your base maximum Health by {scale=150|150}.

Paradox.card_desc: [Second Chance] Reduce the Cooldown of Second Chance by {scale=0.5|0.5}s.

Phantom Pain.card_desc: [Setback] Gain {scale=10|10}% Lifesteal against enemies hit by Setback for 5s.

Safe Haven.card_desc: [Armor] Receive {scale=6|6}% increased healing while Stasis Field is active.

Steady Arm.card_desc: [Setback] Hitting an enemy with Setback restores {scale=1|1} ammo.

Temporal Divide.card_desc: [Stasis Field] Stasis Field is several times larger, but its cooldown is increased by 50%.

Unstable Fissure.card_desc: [Second Chance] Activating Second Chance leaves behind an unstable fissure that after 3s explodes dealing 900 damage.

Alte Lektionen.card_desc: [Rückschlag] Treffer mit Rückschlag gewähren dir 3s lang einen Schild mit {scale=75|75} LP.

Alte Wunden.card_desc: [Rüstung] Erhöht deine maximale Gesundheit um {scale=150|150} LP.

D\u00e9j\u00e0-vu.card_desc: [Rückschlag] Rückschlag wird zu einem explosiven Projektil, das einen Bogen beschreibt und mehrere Gegner gleichzeitig treffen kann.

Fast vergessen.card_desc: [Rüstung] Unter 50% Gesundheit erhältst du um {scale=5|5}% erhöhte Heilung von anderen Spielern.

Hinter dem Schleier.card_desc: [Temporalbarriere] Gehen du oder deine Verbündeten durch die Temporalbarriere, erhöht sich euer Lauftempo 5s lang um {scale=10|10}%.

H\u00f6llenj\u00e4ger.card_desc: [Waffe] Treffer mit einem voll aufgeladenen Schuss erzeugen {scale=1|1} Munition.

Instabiler Riss.card_desc: [Zweite Chance] Bei Aktivierung von Zweite Chance wird ein instabiler Riss erzeugt, der nach 3s explodiert und 900 Schaden verursacht.

Kontinuumswechsel.card_desc: [Zweite Chance] Zweite Chance schickt dich {scale=0.4|0.4}s weiter in die Vergangenheit.

Niemand entkommt.card_desc: [Rückschlag] Rückschlag schickt Gegner {scale=0.3|0.3}s weiter in die Vergangenheit.

Paradox.card_desc: [Zweite Chance] Reduziert die Abklingzeit von Zweite Chance um {scale=0.5|0.5}s.

Phantomschmerz.card_desc: [Rückschlag] Gewährt 5s lang {scale=10|10}% Lebensraub gegen von Rückschlag getroffene Gegner.

R\u00fcckzugsort.card_desc: [Rüstung] Während Temporalbarriere aktiv ist, erhältst du um {scale=6|6}% erhöhte Heilung.

Temporale Teilung.card_desc: [Temporalbarriere] Die Temporalbarriere ist größer, aber die Abklingzeit erhöht sich um 50%.

Unendlicher Motor.card_desc: [Temporalbarriere] Nach Aktivierung von Temporalbarriere verbrauchst du {scale=1|1}s lang keine Munition.

Ungelebtes Leben.card_desc: [Zweite Chance] Erhöht die Heilung durch Zweite Chance um zusätzliche {scale=150|150} LP.

Verlorenes Erbe.card_desc: [Temporalbarriere] Nach Aktivierung von Temporalbarriere wirst du 3s lang {scale=80|80} LP pro Sekunde geheilt.

Zahn der Zeit.card_desc: [Rüstung] Eliminierungen laden deine Überkraft um {scale=1|1}% auf.

Aucune \u00e9chappatoire.card_desc: [Contretemps] Contretemps renvoie les ennemis {scale=0.3|0.3}s de plus dans le passé.

Cr\u00e9ation infinie.card_desc: [Mur de stase] À l'activation de Mur de stase, vous ne consommez plus de munitions pendant {scale=1|1}s.

D\u00e9j\u00e0-vu.card_desc: [Contretemps] Contretemps tire un projectile explosif, et peut donc atteindre plusieurs cibles.

Division temporelle.card_desc: [Mur de stase] Le Mur de stase est beaucoup plus grand mais se recharge 50% moins vite.

Douleur fant\u00f4me.card_desc: [Contretemps] Vous obtenez {scale=10|10}% de drain de vie pendant 5s contre les ennemis touchés par Contretemps.

Fissure instable.card_desc: [Retour arrière] Retour arrière laisse à votre emplacement initial une Fissure instable qui explose après 3s en infligeant 900 dégâts de zone.

Fl\u00e9au du mal.card_desc: [Arme] Vos tirs d'arme entièrement chargés et réussis redonnent {scale=1|1} munition(s).

Havre de paix.card_desc: [Armure] Quand Mur de stase est actif, vous recevez {scale=6|6}% de soins supplémentaires.

H\u00e9ritage perdu.card_desc: [Mur de stase] À l'activation de Mur de stase, vous regagnez {scale=80|80} PV/s pendant 3s.

Le\u00e7ons du pass\u00e9.card_desc: [Contretemps] Toucher une cible avec Contretemps vous donne un bouclier de {scale=75|75} PV pendant 3s.

Lointain souvenir.card_desc: [Armure] En-dessous de 50% de PV, vous recevez {scale=5|5}% de soins en plus en provenance des coéquipiers.

Nouveau continuum.card_desc: [Retour arrière] Retour arrière vous renvoie {scale=0.4|0.4}s de plus dans le passé.

Paradoxe.card_desc: [Retour arrière] Retour arrière se recharge {scale=0.5|0.5}s plus vite.

Par-del\u00e0 le voile.card_desc: [Mur de stase] Pour vous et vos alliés, traverser le Mur de stase augmente la vitesse de {scale=10|10}% pendant 5s.

Ravages du temps.card_desc: [Armure] Les éliminations donnent {scale=1|1}% de charge d'ultime.

R\u00e9alit\u00e9 potentielle.card_desc: [Retour arrière] Retour arrière vous rend {scale=150|150} PV de plus.

R\u00e9\u00e9crire l'histoire.card_desc: [Mur de stase] Retour arrière génère {scale=1|1} munition(s).

Stabilit\u00e9.card_desc: [Contretemps] Toucher un ennemi avec Contretemps redonne {scale=1|1} munition(s).

Beyond The Veil.card_desc: [Stasis Field] You and allies gain {scale=10|10}% increased Movement Speed for 5s after passing through Stasis Field.

Continuum Shift.card_desc: [Second Chance] Second Chance sends you {scale=0.4|0.4}s further into the past.

Deja vu.card_desc: [Setback] Setback becomes a lobbed explosive, capable of rewinding multiple enemies.

Distant Memory.card_desc: [Armor] While below 50% Health receive {scale=5|5}% increased healing from other players.

Hell Hunter.card_desc: [Weapon] Hitting fully charged weapon shots restores {scale=1|1} ammo.

Infinity Engine.card_desc: [Stasis Field] Activating Stasis Field causes you to no longer consume ammo for {scale=1|1}s.

Lessons of the Past.card_desc: [Setback] Hitting an enemy with Setback grants yourself a {scale=75|75} Health Shield for 3s.

Life Unlived.card_desc: [Second Chance] Second Chance heals you an additional {scale=150|150} Health.

Lost Legacy.card_desc: [Stasis Field] Activating Stasis Field heals you {scale=80|80} Health per second for 3s.

No One Escapes.card_desc: [Setback] Setback sends enemies {scale=0.3|0.3}s further into the past.

Old Wounds.card_desc: [Armor] Increase your base maximum Health by {scale=150|150}.

Paradox.card_desc: [Second Chance] Reduce the Cooldown of Second Chance by {scale=0.5|0.5}s.

Phantom Pain.card_desc: [Setback] Gain {scale=10|10}% Lifesteal against enemies hit by Setback for 5s.

Safe Haven.card_desc: Receive {scale=6|6}% increased healing while Stasis Field is active.

Steady Arm.card_desc: [Setback] Hitting an enemy with Setback restores {scale=1|1} ammo.

Temporal Divide.card_desc: [Stasis Field] Stasis Field is several times larger, but its cooldown is increased by 50%.

Unstable Fissure.card_desc: Activating Second Chance leaves behind an unstable fissure that after 3s explodes dealing 900 damage.

Brazo Firme.card_desc: [Revés] Recuperas {scale=1|1} de munición al golpear a un enemigo con Revés.

Cazador infernal.card_desc: [Arma] Recuperas {scale=1|1} de munición si aciertas con un arma completamente cargada.

D\u00e9j\u00e0 vu.card_desc: [Revés] Revés se convierte en un explosivo con trayectoria en arco capaz de rebobinar a varios enemigos.

Desplazamiento Continuo.card_desc: [Segunda Oportunidad] Segunda Oportunidad te envía {scale=0.4|0.4} s en el pasado.

Divisi\u00f3n temporal.card_desc: [Campo de Estasis] Campo de estasis es varias veces más grande, pero su recarga aumenta un 50%.

Dolor Fantasma.card_desc: [Revés] Obtienes un {scale=10|10}% de robo de vida contra enemigos alcanzados por Revés por 5s.

Fisura inestable.card_desc: [Segunda Oportunidad] Activar Segunda oportunidad deja una fisura inestable que explota tras 3s infligiendo 900 PS de daño.

Heridas viejas.card_desc: [Armadura] Tu salud base máxima aumenta en {scale=150|150} puntos.

Lecciones del pasado.card_desc: [Revés] Golpear a un enemigo con Revés te otorga un escudo con {scale=75|75} PS por 3 s.

Legado Perdido.card_desc: [Campo de Estasis] Al activar Campo de Estasis te cura {scale=80|80} PS por segundo por 3 s.

Los estragos del tiempo.card_desc: [Armadura] Las eliminaciones cargan un {scale=1|1}% tu habilidad definitiva.

M\u00e1s all\u00e1 del velo.card_desc: [Campo de Estasis] Tú y tus aliados obtienen un {scale=10|10}% de velocidad de movimiento durante 5s tras atravesar un Campo de estasis.

Memoria lejana.card_desc: [Armadura] Si tienes menos de un 50 % de salud recibes un {scale=5|5}% aumento de curación de otros jugadores.

Motor Infinito.card_desc: [Campo de Estasis] Al activar Campo de estasis, no consumes munición durante {scale=1|1}s.

Nadie Escapa.card_desc: [Revés] Revés envía a los enemigos lejos en el pasado en {scale=0.3|0.3} s.

Paradoja.card_desc: [Segunda Oportunidad] Se reduce la recarga de Segunda oportunidad en {scale=0.5|0.5}s.

Reescribiendo la historia.card_desc: [Campo de Estasis] Recuperas {scale=1|1} de munición con Segunda oportunidad.

Refugio.card_desc: [Armadura] Recibes un {scale=6|6}% de aumento de curación mientras Campo de estasis está activo.

Vida sin Vida.card_desc: [Segunda Oportunidad] Segunda Oportunidad te cura {scale=150|150} PS adicional.

Atrav\u00e9s do v\u00e9u.card_desc: [Campo de Estase] Você e seus aliados ganham {scale=10|10}% mais velocidade de movimento por 5s ao atravessar o Campo de Estase.

Bra\u00e7o Est\u00e1vel.card_desc: [Retrocesso] Atingir inimigos com o Retrocesso restaura {scale=1|1} de munição

Ca\u00e7ador do Inferno.card_desc: [Arma] Acertar disparos totalmente carregados da sua arma restaura {scale=1|1} de munição

D\u00e9j\u00e0 vu.card_desc: [Retrocesso] O projétil do Retrocesso agora descreve um arco e é explosivo, capaz de afetar inúmeros alvos.

Desola\u00e7\u00e3o do Tempo.card_desc: [Armadura] Eliminações geram {scale=1|1}% de recarga da suprema.

Divis\u00e3o do Tempo.card_desc: [Campo de Estase] O Campo de Estase é muito mais largo, mas tem um intervalo 50% maior.

Dor Fantasma.card_desc: [Retrocesso] Recebe {scale=10|10}% de roubo de vida por 5s dos inimigos atingidos por Retrocesso.

Fenda na Continuidade.card_desc: [Segunda Chance] Segunda Chance te manda {scale=0.4|0.4}s mais distante no passado.

Fissura Inst\u00e1vel.card_desc: [Segunda Chance] Ativar a Segunda Chance deixa para trás uma fissura instável que explode após 3s, causando 900 de dano.

Hist\u00f3ria Reescrita.card_desc: [Campo de Estase] Segunda Chance concede {scale=1|1} de munição.

Legado Perdido.card_desc: [Campo de Estase] Ativar o Campo de Estase te cura em {scale=80|80} de vida por segundo durante 3s.

Li\u00e7\u00f5es do Passado.card_desc: [Retrocesso] Atingir inimigos com Retrocesso te concede um escudo de {scale=75|75} de vida por 3s.

Mem\u00f3ria Distante.card_desc: [Armadura] Recebe {scale=5|5}% mais cura dos outros jogadores quando estiver abaixo de 50% de vida.

Motor Infinito.card_desc: [Campo de Estase] Ativar o Campo de Estase faz você não consumir munição durante {scale=1|1}s.

Ningu\u00e9m Escapa.card_desc: [Retrocesso] Retrocesso manda os inimigos {scale=0.3|0.3}s mais longe no passado.

Paradoxo.card_desc: [Segunda Chance] Reduz o intervalo de Segunda Chance em {scale=0.5|0.5}s.

Ref\u00fagio Seguro.card_desc: [Armadura] Recebe {scale=6|6}% mais cura enquanto o Campo de Estase estiver ativado.

Velhas Feridas.card_desc: [Armadura] Aumenta sua vida máxima base em {scale=150|150}.

Vida n\u00e3o vivida.card_desc: [Segunda Chance] Segunda Chance cura você em {scale=150|150} de vida adicional.

\u0412\u0435\u0447\u043d\u044b\u0439 \u0.card_desc: [Стазисное поле] При активации Стазисного поля боеприпасы не расходуются в течение {scale=1|1} с.

\u0412\u0440\u0435\u043c\u0435\u043d\u04.card_desc: Стазисное поле становится в несколько раз больше, но восстанавливается на 50% дольше.

\u0414\u0430\u043b\u0435\u043a\u043e\u04.card_desc: [Броня] При уровне здоровья ниже 50% вы получаете на {scale=5|5}% больше исцеления от других игроков.

\u0414\u0435\u0436\u0430\u0432\u044e.card_desc: [Шаг назад] Шаг назад превращается во взрывной снаряд и может переместить в прошлое нескольких врагов.

\u0417\u0430 \u0437\u0430\u0432\u0435\u0.card_desc: [Стазисное поле] Когда вы и ваши союзники проходите через Стазисное поле, ваша скорость передвижения увеличивается на {scale=10|10}% на 5 с.

\u041d\u0435\u043f\u0440\u043e\u0436\u04.card_desc: [Второй шанс] Второй шанс исцеляет вас еще на {scale=150|150} ед.

\u041d\u0435\u0441\u0442\u0430\u0431\u04.card_desc: [Второй шанс] Активация Второго шанса создает нестабильный разлом, который взрывается через 3 с. и наносит 900 ед. урона.

\u041e\u0445\u043e\u0442\u043d\u0438\u04.card_desc: [Оружие] Выстрелы из полностью заряженного оружия восстанавливают {scale=1|1} ед. боеприпасов.

\u041f\u0430\u0440\u0430\u0434\u043e\u04.card_desc: [Второй шанс] Перезарядка Второго шанса сокращается на {scale=0.5|0.5} с.

\u041f\u0435\u0440\u0435\u043f\u0438\u04.card_desc: [Стазисное поле] Второй шанс генерирует {scale=1|1} ед. боеприпасов.

\u0421\u0434\u0432\u0438\u0433 \u0432 \u.card_desc: [Второй шанс] Второй шанс отправляет вас на {scale=0.4|0.4} с. дальше в прошлое.

\u0421\u043f\u0430\u0441\u0435\u043d\u04.card_desc: [Шаг назад] Шаг назад отправляет врагов на {scale=0.3|0.3} с. дальше в прошлое.

\u0421\u0442\u0430\u0440\u044b\u0435 \u0.card_desc: [Броня] Ваше базовое максимальное здоровье увеличивается на {scale=150|150} ед.

\u0422\u0432\u0435\u0440\u0434\u0430\u04.card_desc: [Шаг назад] Попадания по врагу Шагом назад восстанавливают {scale=1|1} ед. боеприпасов.

\u0423\u0431\u0435\u0436\u0438\u0449\u04.card_desc: [Броня] Во время действия Стазисного поля вы получаете на {scale=6|6}% больше исцеления.

\u0423\u0440\u043e\u043a\u0438 \u043f\u0.card_desc: [Шаг назад] Попадание по врагу Шагом назад дает вам щит прочностью {scale=75|75} ед. на 3 с.

\u0423\u0442\u0435\u0440\u044f\u043d\u04.card_desc: [Стазисное поле] Активация Стазисного поля исцеляет вас на {scale=80|80} ед. в секунду в течение 3 с.

\u0424\u0430\u043d\u0442\u043e\u043c\u04.card_desc: [Шаг назад] Вы на 5 с. получаете {scale=10|10}% вампиризма против врагов, задетых Шагом назад.

Bezpieczne schronienie.card_desc: [Pancerz] Zwiększa leczenie o {scale=6|6}%, gdy Pole zastojowe jest aktywne.

B\u00f3l fantomowy.card_desc: [Przeniesienie] Zapewnia {scale=10|10}% do kradzieży życia wrogów trafionych Przeniesieniem na 5 s.

Deja vu.card_desc: [Przeniesienie] Przeniesienie to teraz eksplodujący pocisk lecący lobem, który może przenieść w czasie kilku wrogów.

Lekcje przesz\u0142o\u015bci.card_desc: [Przeniesienie] Trafienie wroga Przeniesieniem przyznaje ci tarczę o wytrzymałości {scale=75|75} pkt na 3 s.

\u0141owca z piek\u0142a rodem.card_desc: [Broń] Trafienie wroga w pełni naładowanym strzałem przywraca {scale=1|1} szt. amunicji.

Nieprze\u017cyte \u017cycie.card_desc: [Druga szansa] Druga szansa przywraca ci dodatkowo {scale=150|150} PZ.

Niestabilna szczelina.card_desc: [Druga szansa] Aktywacja Drugiej szansy wytwarza niestabilną szczelinę, która po 3 s eksploduje, zadając 900 obrażeń.

Nikt nie ucieknie.card_desc: [Przeniesienie] Przeniesienie cofa wrogów o {scale=0.3|0.3} s dalej w przeszłość.

Odleg\u0142e wspomnienie.card_desc: [Pancerz] Gdy zdrowie spada poniżej 50%, otrzymujesz o {scale=5|5}% więcej leczenia od innych graczy.

Paradoks.card_desc: [Druga szansa] Skraca czas odnowienia Drugiej szansy o {scale=0.5|0.5} s.

Perpetuum mobile.card_desc: [Pole zastojowe] Aktywacja Pola zastojowego powoduje, że nie zużywasz amunicji przez {scale=1|1} s.

Pewna r\u0119ka.card_desc: [Przeniesienie] Trafienie wroga Przeniesieniem przywraca {scale=1|1} szt. amunicji.

Podzia\u0142 czasowy.card_desc: [Pole zastojowe] Pole zastojowe jest kilka razy większe, ale jego czas odnowienia jest dłuższy o 50%.

Przesuni\u0119cie ku kontinuum.card_desc: [Druga szansa] Druga szansa cofa cię o {scale=0.4|0.4} s głębiej w przeszłość.

Utracone dziedzictwo.card_desc: [Pole zastojowe] Aktywacja Pola zastojowego przywraca ci {scale=80|80} PZ na sekundę przez 3 s.

Za zas\u0142on\u0105.card_desc: [Pole zastojowe] Jeśli ty lub sojusznik przejdziecie przez pole zastojowe, wasza szybkość ruchu wzrośnie o {scale=10|10}% na 5 s.

Zafa\u0142szowana historia.card_desc: [Pole zastojowe] Druga szansa generuje {scale=1|1} szt. amunicji.

Cehennem Avc\u0131s\u0131.card_desc: [Silah] Tam yüklenmiş silah atışları ile vuruş yapmak {scale=1|1} cephane üretir.

\u00c7eli\u015fki.card_desc: [İkinci Şans] İkinci Şans'ın Bekleme Süresini {scale=0.5|0.5} sn azaltır.

Deja vu.card_desc: Terslik, birden çok düşmanı geçmişe götürebilen patlayıcı bir atışa dönüşür.

Dengesiz \u00c7atlak.card_desc: [İkinci Şans] İkinci Şans etkinleştirilince 3 sn sonra patlayarak 900 hasar veren dengesiz bir çatlak oluşur.

Ge\u00e7ici Ayr\u0131l\u0131k.card_desc: [Durağan Alan] Durağan Alan daha da büyür ancak bekleme süresi %50 artar.

Ge\u00e7mi\u015fin Verdi\u011fi Dersler.card_desc: [Terslik] Terslik ile vuruş yapmak sana 3 saniye boyunca {scale=75|75} Canlık bir Kalkan verir.

G\u00fcvenli S\u0131\u011f\u0131nak.card_desc: [Zırh] Durağan Alan etkinken %{scale=6|6} artırılmış iyileşme al.

Hayali Ac\u0131.card_desc: [Terslik] Terslik ile vurulan düşmanlara karşı 5 sn boyunca %{scale=10|10} Can Çalma kazan.

Ka\u00e7\u0131\u015f Yok.card_desc: [Terslik] Terslik, düşmanları {scale=0.3|0.3} sn daha geçmişe gönderir.

Kay\u0131p Miras.card_desc: [Durağan Alan] Durağan Alan'ı etkinleştirince 3 sn boyunca her saniye {scale=80|80} Can iyileşirsin.

Perde Arkas\u0131.card_desc: [Durağan Alan] Sen ve müttefiklerin Durağan Alan'dan geçtikten sonra 5 sn boyunca %{scale=10|10} Hareket Hızı kazanırsınız.

Sa\u011flam Silah.card_desc: [Terslik] Terslik ile bir düşmanı vurmak {scale=1|1} cephane üretir.

Sonsuzluk Motoru.card_desc: [Durağan Alan] Durağan Alan'ı etkinleştirince {scale=1|1} sn boyunca cephane harcamazsın.

S\u00fcrey De\u011fi\u015fimi.card_desc: [İkinci Şans] İkinci Şans seni {scale=0.4|0.4} sn daha geçmişe gönderir.

Uzak Hat\u0131ra.card_desc: [Zırh] %50 Canın altındayken diğer oyunculardan %{scale=5|5} artırılmış İyileşme al.

Ya\u015fanmam\u0131\u015f Hayat.card_desc: [İkinci Şans] İkinci Şans seni ek olarak {scale=150|150} Can iyileştirir.
